suggestions: 9. Term. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, this Agreement shall terminate and be of no further force and effect one (1) year from the date hereof, provided that in no case shall the Receiving Party be relieved from its responsibilities with respect to any breach of this Agreement prior to such termination. The confidentiality obligations set forth in this Agreement shall continue for a period of three (3) years from the date any Confidential Information is disclosed to the Receiving Party, or for three (3) years following the termination of this Agreement, whichever occurs later.
originalTexts: 9. Term. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, this Agreement shall terminate and be of no further force and effect one (1) year from the date hereof, provided that in no case shall the Receiving Party be relieved from its responsibilities with respect to any breach of this Agreement prior to such termination.
